message.name: ERR_XFV_DATES_OVERLAP
message.locale: The start and end date must not overlap with another published PCR Configuration on the same case.

message.name: ERR_XFV_NO_RANGE_MAPPING
message.locale: There must be at least one range mapping defined for the PCR Configuration.

message.name: ERR_XFV_INVALID_PCR_RULE_SET
message.locale: The selected rule set is not a valid PCR rule set.

message.name: ERR_XFV_NO_RUN_MANUALLY_AND_NO_RULE_SET_NAME
message.locale: You must select either a Rule Set Name or the option to Run Manually.

message.name: ERR_XFV_NO_PCR_RUNPOINTS_SELECTED
message.locale: At least one PCR Run Point must be selected.

message.name: ERR_XFV_NO_PCR_RUNPOINTS_SHOULD_BE_SELECTED
message.locale: You cannot select a PCR Run Point if you have not specified a Rule Set Name.
